titleStmt.title: A proposal for a general satisfaction, in relation to George Oldner's invention, to prevent ships from foundering or sinking at sea, &c. To which is added an answer to a pamphlet, entituled, An epistle to a Member of Parliament. As also the other advertisements; (viz.)

notesStmt.note: Dated at the botton of p. 1: January the 13th, 169[illegible].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
